properties.name: 4620 painters st., New Orleans, LA
properties.description: Posted by Gentilly4620 PAINTERS ST,New Orleans,LAWhere are you living now?homeHave you moved back?yesIf so, when?2005-09-01If so, why?The owner\'s house was on higher ground (a ridge) than most of his neighbors. He was able to stay after the hurricane.Anything else?There was minor damage to the interior of the house, but it\'s now 99% back to normal. The owner has lived in this house his entire life.

properties.name: 5516 spain st., New Orleans, LA
properties.description: Posted by Gentilly5516 SPAIN ST,New Orleans,LAWhere are you living now?homeHave you moved back?yesIf so, when?2005-11-01If so, why?Owner says he moved back as soon as possible.Anything else?The entire downstairs was destroyed. The owner and his wife lived upstairs and repaired the entire house by hand. It took them 6 1/2 months of work. It\'s now nearly completed.
